name.japanese: ウォーターセブン裏通り

description: The lower-lying backstreet district of Water 7, vulnerable to the annual Aqua Laguna tidal wave. This area was heavily damaged when the crew members were trapped during the storm.

keyEvents.title: Nami Braves the Aqua Laguna
keyEvents.description: Nami descends through the dangerous backstreets to reach Luffy during the approaching Aqua Laguna.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Nami's bravery and dedication to her crew.

keyEvents.title: Nami Reveals Robin's Sacrifice
keyEvents.description: In the backstreets, Nami tells Luffy about Robin's sacrifice.
keyEvents.significance: This location becomes the catalyst point for the Enies Lobby mission.

keyEvents.title: Aqua Laguna Destroys the Backstreets
keyEvents.description: The massive Aqua Laguna wave crashes into the backstreets with devastating force, destroying buildings and threatening all life in the area.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the destructive power of Water 7's annual natural disaster.

statusHistory.reason: Heavily damaged by Aqua Laguna in this episode

description: A government stronghold island that serves as a gateway to Impel Down and Marine Headquarters. Known as the 'Island of No Night' due to its perpetual daylight. This is where CP9 is taking Robin.

keyEvents.title: Spandam Awaits at Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: Spandam is shown at Enies Lobby with Funkfreed, eagerly awaiting CP9's arrival with Robin and Franky.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Enies Lobby as the destination for Robin and the target for the Straw Hats' rescue mission.

name.japanese: 海列車パッフィング・トム

description: The sea-going train that connects Water 7 to Enies Lobby. In this episode, it is carrying CP9, Robin, Franky, and Usopp (as Sogeking) toward Enies Lobby, while Sanji fights government agents aboard.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Defeats Government Agents
keyEvents.description: Sanji finishes defeating all government agents in his train car aboard the Puffing Tom.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Sanji's progress in fighting through the train to reach Robin.

statusHistory.reason: Train in operation heading to Enies Lobby
